author: Source: WGAL-TV Lancaster
title: Biden reveals moment he told family it was a no-go - WGAL-TV Lancaster
text:
Joe Biden got quick support from his wife, Dr. Jill Biden, when he informed his family that he'd decided against running for president. The two recalled the vice president's decision in an interview with CBS that's set to broadcast Sunday night on "60 Minutes."
 WGAL-TV Lancaster.
